knimeNode.name: Diagnose Workflow
knimeNode.shortDescription: Gathers information on the workflow the node is placed in.

intro.p: This node outputs a table that contains basic information about every node in the workflow, like the name, ID, size on disk and execution time.

The output table lists all nodes in the workflow that were executed since the last reset. This also includes nodes in metanodes up to the specified nesting depth. The detailed statistics are:
Row Key: The row key corresponds to the unique node ID
Name: Name of the node
Class Name: If available, the class name of the node factory
Type: Either Native Node, Metanode or Component
Source URI: If available (i.e. the node is a linked Metanode/Component), the location of the source node
Deprecated: Whether the node is marked as deprecated
Disk Space: The size of the node on disk, including configuration, data and potential sub-workflows
Execution Time: How long the last execution of the node took in milliseconds
Nr of Executions: How often the node has been executed since the start of the application
Additionally, this node outputs a workflow summary string in XML or JSON format that includes even more useful information like the configuration settings of the node or its ports.
